snippet: The Food and Drug Administration has approved the first brain wave test to help diagnose attention deficit hyperactivity disorder in children.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves first brain wave test to help diagnose attention deficit hyperactivity disorder in children.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration has approved the first brain wave test to help diagnose attention deficit hyperactivity disorder in children.

headline.main: Brain Test to Diagnose A.D.H.D. Is Approved
